title: Shanghai Museum's Meow Night Draws Crowds With Ancient Egyptian Cat Relics
content: Shanghai Museum has pulled in crowds this summer for an exhibition of ancient Egyptian relics including cat statues and other feline imagery, which on Saturday nights allows up to 200 visitors to bring along their own four-legged friends.
summary: Shanghai Museum has pulled in crowds this summer for an exhibition of ancient Egyptian relics including cat statues and other feline imagery, which on Saturday nights allows up to 200 visitors to bring along their own four-legged friends.

title: Mining Tycoon's New Diktat: Don't Go Out For Coffee During Work Hours
content: Do not leave the building, or take a coffee break - these are among the new instructions an Australian mining boss plans to give all his employees.
summary: Do not leave the building, or take a coffee break - these are among the new instructions an Australian mining boss plans to give all his employees.

title: 3 Foreign Workers Trapped in Collapsed Thai Tunnel Found Dead
content: Preliminary investigations suggest that asphyxiation due to oxygen deprivation was the probable cause of death.
summary: Preliminary investigations suggest that asphyxiation due to oxygen deprivation was the probable cause of death.

title: "Unstable Uncle": Internet Reacts To Viral Donald Trump Dance Video
content: Former US President Donald Trump's dance moves at a public event on Friday have taken social media by storm. The annual Moms for Liberty event, held in Washington DC, saw 78-year-old Tump shake a leg on stage with the group's co-founder.
summary: Former US President Donald Trump's dance moves at a public event on Friday have taken social media by storm. The annual Moms for Liberty event, held in Washington DC, saw 78-year-old Tump shake a leg on stage with the group's co-founder.

title: Over 700 Protestors Sent To Security Jails In Venezuela After Elections
content: More than 700 people arrested during protests that erupted after Venezuela's disputed presidential election have been transferred to maximum security prisons, a human rights group said Saturday.
summary: More than 700 people arrested during protests that erupted after Venezuela's disputed presidential election have been transferred to maximum security prisons, a human rights group said Saturday.

title: On Camera, US Woman Makes Rottweiler Kill Boyfriend's 9-Year-Old Daughter
content: A woman allegedly killed her boyfriends 9-year-old daughter by thrashing her and making her Rottweiler dog attack the child at their home in US' Florida, police said.
summary: A woman allegedly killed her boyfriends 9-year-old daughter by thrashing her and making her Rottweiler dog attack the child at their home in US' Florida, police said.

title: After Land Invasion And Death From Above, A New Enemy In Gaza - Polio
content: A health official said a polio vaccination campaign began in Gaza on Saturday, while an aid worker said a large-scale rollout would begin on Sunday, coinciding with a "humanitarian pause" agreed by Israel and Hamas.
summary: A health official said a polio vaccination campaign began in Gaza on Saturday, while an aid worker said a large-scale rollout would begin on Sunday, coinciding with a "humanitarian pause" agreed by Israel and Hamas.

title: Celebrated "Russian Spy" Whale Hvaldimir Found Dead In Norway: Report
content: A beluga whale named Hvaldimir which captured the world's imagination in 2019 was found dead in Norway, a report said. The 14-foot-long and 2,700-pound whale was spotted with a harness seemingly designed for a camera five years ago.
summary: A beluga whale named Hvaldimir which captured the world's imagination in 2019 was found dead in Norway, a report said. The 14-foot-long and 2,700-pound whale was spotted with a harness seemingly designed for a camera five years ago.

title: Israeli Army Announces Death Of Soldier During Ongoing Raid In West Bank
content: Israel's army on Saturday announced the first death of a soldier during its ongoing raid in the occupied West Bank that began four days ago.
summary: Israel's army on Saturday announced the first death of a soldier during its ongoing raid in the occupied West Bank that began four days ago.

title: UNICEF Launches Emergency Tender For Mpox Vaccines To Help Hard-Hit Nations
content: UNICEF said Saturday that it has launched an emergency tender for mpox vaccines to help countries hardest hit by the recent outbreak of the disease.
summary: UNICEF said Saturday that it has launched an emergency tender for mpox vaccines to help countries hardest hit by the recent outbreak of the disease.

title: 8 Killed After Bus Carrying 47 Overturns In US State Of Mississippi: Report
content: Eight people including an infant were killed in a bus crash in the southern US state of Mississippi in the early hours of Saturday, local media reported.
summary: Eight people including an infant were killed in a bus crash in the southern US state of Mississippi in the early hours of Saturday, local media reported.

title: Trump "Disrespected Sacred Ground' At US Military Cemetery: Kamala Harris
content: Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris said Saturday that her Republican rival Donald Trump "disrespected sacred ground" at a US military cemetery during a contentious pre-election visit.
summary: Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris said Saturday that her Republican rival Donald Trump "disrespected sacred ground" at a US military cemetery during a contentious pre-election visit.

title: 6-Year-Old Girl Among 7 Killed As Bus Overturns In Mississippi
content: Seven people, including a six-year-old and 16-year-old, were killed when a bus overturned east of Vicksburg, Mississippi, early Saturday, Warren County Coroner Doug Huskey said.
summary: Seven people, including a six-year-old and 16-year-old, were killed when a bus overturned east of Vicksburg, Mississippi, early Saturday, Warren County Coroner Doug Huskey said.

title: Houthis Attack Container Vessel For Second Time In Gulf Of Aden
content: Yemen's Houthi said on Saturday that they attacked a Liberia-flagged container vessel for a second time in the latest action against commercial shipping in the Gulf of Aden.
summary: Yemen's Houthi said on Saturday that they attacked a Liberia-flagged container vessel for a second time in the latest action against commercial shipping in the Gulf of Aden.

title: "Ship Tilted, We Were Thrown": Crew Member On UK Tycoon Mike Lynch Yacht
content: A crew member on Mike Lynch's yacht has spoken of being thrown into the water and efforts to rescue passengers as a storm sank the vessel off Sicily this month, in a disaster that killed the British tech tycoon and six other people.
summary: A crew member on Mike Lynch's yacht has spoken of being thrown into the water and efforts to rescue passengers as a storm sank the vessel off Sicily this month, in a disaster that killed the British tech tycoon and six other people.

title: Trump Backs Decriminalisation Of Marijuana To Save Taxpayer Dollars
content: Former U.S. President Donald Trump on Saturday suggested his support for the decriminalization of marijuana, saying taxpayer dollars should not be wasted arresting people carrying "personal amounts."
summary: Former U.S. President Donald Trump on Saturday suggested his support for the decriminalization of marijuana, saying taxpayer dollars should not be wasted arresting people carrying "personal amounts."

title: This Blood Test Accurately Detects Fatal Brain Cancers In 60 Minutes
content: A new blood test developed by scientists can detect glioblastoma, a deadly brain cancer, in just 60 minutes using a small blood sample.
summary: A new blood test developed by scientists can detect glioblastoma, a deadly brain cancer, in just 60 minutes using a small blood sample.

title: US Rapper Fatman Scoop Collapses On Stage While Performing, Dies: Report
content: US rapper Fatman Scoop has died, his manager announced Saturday, after the 53-year-old artist suffered a medical emergency while performing on stage.
summary: US rapper Fatman Scoop has died, his manager announced Saturday, after the 53-year-old artist suffered a medical emergency while performing on stage.

title: Brazil Latest Country To Ban X. List Of Nations Where You Can't Access It
content: With its ban of X, which went into effect on Saturday, Brazil joins a small club of countries to have taken similar measures against the social network, most of them run by authoritarian regimes.
summary: With its ban of X, which went into effect on Saturday, Brazil joins a small club of countries to have taken similar measures against the social network, most of them run by authoritarian regimes.

title: UK's Seat Should Go To India: Ex-Diplomat On UN Security Council Reforms
content: The United Nations Security Council needs urgent reforms and India should get its rightful place as a permanent member of the top UN body, says former Singapore diplomat professor Kishore Mahbubani.
summary: The United Nations Security Council needs urgent reforms and India should get its rightful place as a permanent member of the top UN body, says former Singapore diplomat professor Kishore Mahbubani.
